description.value:
Consumable (Ammunition)

You have a +3 bonus to attack rolls made with this enhanced rocket launcher ammunition, which deals [[/r 4d6]] kinetic damage on a hit. This bonus is in addition to any bonuses granted by the weapon. Once the rocket is fired, it no longer gives a bonus. Additionally, hit or miss, the rocket then explodes. The target and each creature within 15 feet must make a DC 24 Dexterity saving throw, taking [[/r 12d10]] kinetic damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.

Â 

Rocket, fragmentation

This rocket launcher ammunition deals [[/r 2d6]] kinetic damage on a hit. Additionally, hit or miss, the rocket then explodes. The target and each creature within 15 feet must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking [[/r 2d10]] kinetic damage on a failed save or half as much on a successful one.
